item.title: Outside Wholefoods, 12th August
item.description:
A homeless man sleeps here every night and leaves litter and bottles of urine strew across the pavement. His stuff is currently strew across the floor and opposite outside the side entrance of Foxtons estate agent and needs removing.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wilmer Place, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped Bed, 12th August
item.description:
